# nyclodging

`nyclogding` contains shiny application and documentation for analyzing Airbnb listings in New York City in 2019.

## Installation

You can install the development version of nyclodging like so:

``` r
remotes::install_github("qiushiyan/nyclodging")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(nyclodging)
dplyr::glimpse(listings)
```
